ground_truth_answer: For pain relief, apply moist heat 3-4 times daily and use over-the-counter medications like ibuprofen. Exercise treatments focus on stretching and range of motion, including shoulder stretches, wall crawls, and pulley exercises. Physical therapy starts with pain control using ice, heat, ultrasound, and gentle mobilizations, then progresses to stretching exercises that should be done frequently throughout the day, ideally once every hour.
